title: 1000 Wins
body: Do Rioters still play with us for 1000 normal wins? I just reached mine (totally something to brag about, I know) and wondered if one would like to grace me with their presence. :3

replies.body: I'm no Rioter, but I love your IGN. Can we be friends?

We sure do! :o Your IGN is Ramona Flowers! I'd be honored to play with you! When are you free? 

*P.S. Bread makes you fat.*
More friends the better! But I have to warn you... I'm a lvl 5 vegan.
thats crazy, im only a level 4 meat eater! I need more EXP to become Level 5.. Better grind those Mince!
